condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Sch.2 Sec. I. A.1. | Description :The Recipient shall maintain throughout Project implementation, the PSC[Project Steering Committee], with mandate and composition acceptable to the Association, to be responsible for the overalloversight of the Project and, as such, to ensure that Project activities are implem. in a manner consistent with the developmentobjective of the Proj in accord with the prov. of this agreement and PIM. | Due Date :31-Aug-2010

Finance Agreement :Sch.2 Sec. IV. B. 1. b | Description :Disbursement for any amount under Category (2) (a) unless the Recipienthas complied with the conditions set out in Section V. A (b) (i) of this schedule. Section V A (b) (i) refers to the deposit ofcounterpart Fund of USD 1 million by June 15, 2012. Category (2) are "goods, consultants' services and training for part 1 (b)(ii) of the project - first and second installment". | Due Date :15-Jun-2012
Finance Agreement :Sch.2.Sec. II.B.4 | Description :Within three months of effectiveness, the PCU will recruit an independentexternal auditor acceptable to IDA. | Due Date :31-Aug-2010

Finance Agreement :Sch.2.Sec. IV.B.1(a) | Description :Notwithstanding the provisions of Part A of this Section, no withdrawalshall be made:(a) for payments made prior to the date of this Agreement, except that withdrawals up to an aggregate amount not |Due Date :22-Dec-2009

Finance Agreement :Sch.2.Sec.IV.B.1(a)Cont. | Description :to exceed $400,000 equivalent may be made for payments made prior tothis date but on or after June 1, 2009, for eligible expenditures. | Due Date :22-Dec-2009
